title: Query Rewriting for Better Retrieval
description: A 60-second lesson on Query Rewriting for Better Retrieval.

hook.text: Users ask messy questions. Search needs clean queries.

buildup.text: A bad query pulls bad chunks, then the agent answers confidently anyway.

discovery.text: Rewrite: add missing keywords, expand acronyms, and include constraints.

climax.text: Log original + rewritten queries. Use it to tune prompts and synonym lists.

punchline.text: Great retrieval starts with great queries.
